reviewText: See my review for this Andy Garcia movie, I in the Havana review.  No one depicts, loves or understands 40'-50's Cuba, it's music, dance and people, all unique, like Garcia, producer, actor.  A beautiful, historical movie filmed in Cuba.  Forget the plane, go there in his films!
This movie is passion, sad, real, that's why we must have it. Andy Garca was perfect. The music, incredible!!!!!
This is a classic, best movie on what Cuba is really like! Andy Garcia's grandfather's life matches with a neighbors life when they left Cuba. How people think Castro was good is beyond the pail.
